abstract: World tracking has not yet sufficiently mapped the area around the current device position.
overview:
## Discussion

When the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/worldMappingStatus-swift.property] of the session’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession/currentFrame] is [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/WorldMappingStatus-swift.enum/limited], the session has not yet fully mapped the real-world space around the device, nor the scene visible to the camera.

Although it is possible at this time to save a world map by calling [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession/getCurrentWorldMap(completionHandler:)], the resulting [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldMap] is unlikely to be useful for relocalization in the real-world space near the device’s current position.

To produce a higher quality world map, wait for the user to explore more of their surroundings and the session’s status to change to [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/WorldMappingStatus-swift.enum/mapped] or [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/WorldMappingStatus-swift.enum/extending].
rawMarkdown:

# ARFrame.WorldMappingStatus.limited

**Case**

World tracking has not yet sufficiently mapped the area around the current device position.

## Declaration

```swift
case limited
```

## Discussion

When the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/worldMappingStatus-swift.property] of the session’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession/currentFrame] is [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/WorldMappingStatus-swift.enum/limited], the session has not yet fully mapped the real-world space around the device, nor the scene visible to the camera.

Although it is possible at this time to save a world map by calling [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession/getCurrentWorldMap(completionHandler:)], the resulting [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldMap] is unlikely to be useful for relocalization in the real-world space near the device’s current position.

To produce a higher quality world map, wait for the user to explore more of their surroundings and the session’s status to change to [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/WorldMappingStatus-swift.enum/mapped] or [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/WorldMappingStatus-swift.enum/extending].
title: ARFrame.WorldMappingStatus.limited
